name: Dungeon Refund
description:
Robit Bach use to be a treasure hunter, and by treasure hunter I mean he used to steal relics and sell it to the black market, however one unfortunate day on his latest raid, the relic he stole ended up being cursed, and made it so that any type of currency he tried to used dissapear. In order to lift this curse he must now return all of the relics he has stolen, but will he learn his lesson? 

Let's find out!

Made by:

Mateus Germoglio - 3D artist and interface designer.
Valmir Neto - Programmer and game designer.
